skill.name: Vow of Justice
description: Deals [color=#ffffa4][b]95.5% ATK[/b][/color] as [color=#ffffa4][b]Bless DMG[/b][/color] to all enemies, and restore [color=#ffffa4][b]1562 HP[/b][/color] to all allies, then gives all allies 1 stack of [color=#ffffa4][b][i]Blessing[/i][/b][/color].
Crow gains [color=#e7c468][b][Truth][/b][/color], then gain [color=#20629d][b][Clarity][/b][/color] for 2 turns.
Under [color=#20629d][b][Clarity][/b][/color], increase all allies' [color=#ffffa4][b]DMG Dealt[/b][/color] by [color=#ffffa4][b]19.52%[/b][/color].

skill.name: Unjust Hunting Grounds
description: Deals [color=#fe0037][b]119.4% ATK[/b][/color] as [color=#fe0037][b]Curse DMG[/b][/color] to all enemies, Crow gains [color=#e7c468][b][Truth][/b][/color], then gain [color=#a3352d][b][Chaos][/b][/color] for 2 turns.

Under [color=#a3352d][b][Chaos][/b][/color], decrease all enemies' [color=#fe0037][b]DEF[/b][/color] by [color=#fe0037][b]25.38%[/b][/color], adds 1 more shot to [color=#b5152f][b][Arrow of Chaos][/b][/color] and its [color=#fe0037][b]DMG Dealt[/b][/color] by [color=#fe0037][b]19.52%[/b][/color].

skill.name: Golden Arrow Rain - Annihilate
description: [b]Unlock condition: When Crow has [color=#e7c468][b][Truth][/b][/color].[/b]
Consumes all [color=#24507c][b][Arrow of Clarity][/b][/color], deals [b]19.52%[/b] of the recorded damage from [color=#24507c][b][Arrow of Clarity][/b][/color] as [b]Almighty DMG[/b] to all enemies.
Then randomly shoots 4 [color=#b5152f][b][Arrow of Chaos][/b][/color], each dealing [b]79.3% ATK[/b] as [b]Almighty DMG[/b], prioritizing enemies that have not been attacked yet.
Akechi will only deal [b]15% DMG[/b] to the same target.

skill.name: HIGHLIGHT
skill.description: Deals [color=#ffffa4][b]103.46% ATK[/b][/color] as [color=#ffffa4][b]Bless DMG[/b][/color] and [color=#fe0037][b]103.46% ATK[/b][/color] as [color=#fe0037][b]Curse DMG[/b][/color] to all enemies, adds 2 more shoot to [color=#b5152f][b][Arrow of Chaos][/b][/color] for 4 turns.

skill.name: Law
description: When Crow is in the team, he can trigger Desire Sonata for any element.
At the start of battle, increase [b]DMG Dealt[/b] by [b]15.0%[/b] for every triggered Desire Sonata.

skill.name: Desire
skill.description: When dealing [b]Almighty DMG[/b], for every [b]1% DEF[/b] Down on the target, increase [b]DMG Dealt[/b] by [b]0.5%[/b]. (Up to [b]120.0%[/b])

awareness.name: Walking in Fog
description: At the start of battle, give the ally with the highest [b]ATK[/b] [color=#df4023][b][Detective Partner][/b][/color] (Prioritizing Dominate or Rebel Thief).
Crow can manually choose a [color=#df4023][b][Detective Partner][/b][/color] at the start of his turn (There can only be 1 [color=#df4023][b][Detective Partner][/b][/color] at any given time).
Crow gains [b]25%[/b] of the [color=#df4023][b][Detective Partner][/b][/color]'s [b]ATK[/b], up to [b]500/750/1000[/b] (at level 1, 50, 70).

When [color=#df4023][b][Detective Partner][/b][/color] deal [b]DMG[/b] with a Persona skill/HIGHLIGHT/Follow Up, record their average [b]DMG Dealt[/b] to all enemies (If it was a single target skill, then record [b]40%[/b] of the [b]DMG[/b]).
At the start of Crow's turn, gain 1 stack of [color=#24507c][b][Arrow of Clarity][/b][/color] based on the total recorded [b]DMG[/b] then clear the record.
[color=#24507c][b][Arrow of Clarity][/b][/color] lasts for 2 turns.

awareness.name: Suspect Investigation
description: Gains [color=#20629d][b][Clarity][/b][/color] at the start of battle, extends [color=#20629d][b][Clarity][/b][/color] and [color=#a3352d][b][Chaos][/b][/color] to 4 turns.
Increases [b]CRIT Rate[/b] by [b]16%[/b] when you have both [color=#20629d][b][Clarity][/b][/color] and [color=#a3352d][b][Chaos][/b][/color].

awareness.name: Trial of Clues
awareness.description: After dealing [b]DMG[/b] with a Persona skill, increases Crow's and [color=#df4023][b][Detective Partner][/b][/color]'s [b]ATK[/b] by [b]25%[/b] and [b]CRIT DMG[/b] by [b]30%[/b] for 1 turn if that attack's element is different than the last skill.

awareness.name: Shadow Chase
description: [ref=s3][color=#318cb5][b][u][Golden Arrow Rain - Annihilate][/u][/b][/color][/ref] [b]Lv. +3[/b], up to a maximum of [b]Lv. 15[/b].
[ref=hl][color=#318cb5][b][u][Combat Skills][/u][/b][/color][/ref] [b]Lv. +3[/b], up to a maximum of [b]Lv. 15[/b].

awareness.name: True Or False
awareness.description: [ref=hl][color=#318cb5][b][u][HIGHLIGHT][/u][/b][/color][/ref] Effect Boost: Additionally increases [color=#b5152f][b][Arrow of Chaos][/b][/color]'s [b]DMG[/b] by [b]10%[/b] for 4 turns.

awareness.name: Temporary Alliance
description: [ref=s1][color=#318cb5][b][u][Vow of Justice][/u][/b][/color][/ref] [b]Lv. +3[/b], up to a maximum of [b]Lv. 15[/b].
[ref=s2][color=#318cb5][b][u][Unjust Hunting Grounds][/u][/b][/color][/ref] [b]Lv. +3[/b], up to a maximum of [b]Lv. 15[/b].

awareness.name: The Dust Settles
description: Increases [color=#24507c][b][Arrow of Clarity][/b][/color] recorded [b]DMG[/b] by [b]50%[/b] when using [ref=s3][color=#318cb5][b][u][Golden Arrow Rain - Annihilate][/u][/b][/color][/ref].
Crow now sees all allies as [color=#df4023][b][Detective Partners][/b][/color].

In battle, additionally gains [b]CRIT Rate[/b] and [b]CRIT DMG[/b] (that is over [b]100%[/b]) based on [b]40%[/b] of the highest [b]CRIT Rate[/b] and [b]CRIT DMG[/b] among [color=#df4023][b][Detective Partners][/b][/color] (Up to [b]20%[/b] and [b]40%[/b]).
